records.text: It's summer, so I'm doing house restoration projects again. Today I restored this window. I replaced some of the frame because of rot. Put the glass back in, added linseed oil putty, and painted with linseed oil paint. Our house was built in 1932, and this window is one of the originals. So it's 92 years old, and now it will last even longer.While working on it I listened to Robert Logan's album "Cognessence" and Doctor Body's album "Misalignment". Both are really good.

records.text: It's summer, so I'm doing house restoration projects again. Today I restored this window. I replaced some of the frame because of rot. So it's 92 years old, and now it will last even longer.While working on it I listened to Robert Logan's album "Cognessence" and Doctor Body's album "Misalignment". Both are really good.

records.text: I just heard that Sverre M. Fjelstad passed away. He was like a Norwegian version of David Attenborough and I grew up watching his nature films on TV. He once said of his love of the forest that he almost wished fewer people would spend time in the forest, so he could have it to himself. But, he said, spending time in the forest makes you a better person, so he would rather share it, to make people (and society) better.One of my first tracks as DMT was inspired by this: https://soundcloud.com/defaultmediatransmitter/the-forest-makes-you-better
